summary: Adds permanent bound weapons using the vanilla flames as craftable. It also modifies ound Arrows to make them explode upon contact with a surface.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds craftable bound weapons to the forge. These weapons use the vanilla-flames appearance and disappear when sheathed, with the exception of the bow (working on it). The weapons added for now are:

[list]
[*][size=1]Sword[/size]
[size=1][/size][*][size=1]Dagger[/size]
[*][size=1]Battleaxe[/size]
[*][size=1]Bow[/size]
[*][size=1]Arrows[/size]
[*][size=1]Pickaxe[/size]
[*][size=1]Woodcutter's Axe[/size]
[/list]
[size=1]Next on the list: Greatsword, War Axe, Shield, alternate sword/katana.[/size]
[size=2]
The mod[/size] also modifies bound arrows (or any projectile that uses them as a base, such as the Ethereal Arrows Perk from SPERG) to make them explode upon contact with a surface, instead of having them lying around/pincushioning an enemy like normal arrows. It's a purely esthetic explosion, it adds no effect or damage whatsoever. Currently it has no sound since I've yet to find something that doesn't sound too loud for what is actually happening.
author: Othienka
